attributes.action: claw back the majority of Tony Blair's pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair suffered from the lowest public approval rating of any British Prime Minister in history. By the new policy of obeying the "court of public opinion" (ref: Harriet Harman, 1/3/2009) surely the right and moral thing to do is to claw back the majority of this former-PM's pension?
